amendment.description: Amendment provides that none of the funds in the bill may be used to promote or advocate the legalization of prostitution or sex trafficking, and that no funds may be given to any group or organization that does not have a policy that is explicitly opposing prostitution and sex trafficking.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 20 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit funds in the bill from being used for HIV/AIDS programs that do not explicitly oppose legalizing sex trafficking and prostitution.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Akin amendment Agreed to by recorded vote: 306 - 113 (Roll no. 340).
